name: Werecop's Archives: Case Of Deeper Excrement
name_original: Werecop's Archives: Case Of Deeper Excrement
description:
A (not very) interactive short fiction, fully voiced, about a man who gained strange superpoweres after a drunken cop bit him and turned him into a fighter for the Lady Justice.

Every LD I always thought that if worsts comes to worst, I can always make an interactive fiction. I never did. This time I planned it from start. Didn’t end up as I planned and it’s missing the crayons illustrations it was supposed to have, but I’m very happy with the story anyway. Too bad I didn’t have time to add some proper branching so it’s extremely linear.

Some fun facts: according to my sport watch I walked 27 kilometers around my house, mostly in night under a full moon, thinking about the story and later about which parts I’ll have to cut out. The story has about 8k words. About an hour of audio.

I didn’t make the time limit for the compo by few hours, sadly, mostly because I grossly underestimated how much time I’ll need to cut the recorded voiceovers. So, jam it is.

Update: minor improvement - added toggles for disabling voiceovers and waiting for click after each sentences in the title screen.
